title: Lift the Shadow Curse
content:
destroy the clones. The dome's description when you inspect it says it reflects double the damage dealt to it back to the attacker, but that doesn't seem to actually be the case (as of Patch #4). So you can also trying attacking the dome directly. Return to camp and speak with Thaniel and Halsin to finish the quest.

If Art is dead, you can cast Speak with Dead to interrogate him and continue the quest.

Three waves of many enemies will spawn. AoE Spells such as Wall of Fire, Sleet Storm, Guardi
